title: Please Report
body: Hi Riot games i met some toxic person like really toxic person saying in his words not mine that i'm a pussy %%%% fuckwit that likes to fuck my own mother and i should kill my self his name is *name removed* plus i have video evidence to prove it hit me up with a inbox or something to get this guy banned Thank you

replies.body: there's no chance riot is going to act on this or do anything, look elsewhere, this is a community that has no shephards, and the ones that remain are too clueless to see their flock are a driven
